description: This bulk-free, 100% Merino wool thermal layer brings a new dimension to active winter wear. With seamlessly integrated insulation and ventilation, perfectly articulated flex zones, and Merino comfort, it’ll be the first thing you grab when you need a warmer layer for your high-intensity, cold-weather adventures.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Max Merino (250) Base Layer 1/4 Zip - Mens
